sect1.title: $cache_dir
sect1.para:
This is the name of the directory where template caches are stored. By default this is "./cache", meaning that it will look for the cache directory in the same directory as the executing php script. You can also use your own
custom cache handler function to control cache files, which will ignore this setting.

note.title: Technical Note
note.para: This setting must be either a relative or absolute path. include_path is not used for writing files.

note.title: Technical Note
note.para: It is not recommended to put this directory under the web server document root.
